headline: A Look At Teledyne Technologies (TDY) Valuation After Swedish Underwater Vehicle Contract News
summary: Teledyne Technologies (TDY) shares have been in focus after Teledyne Gavia delivered the first four GAVIA autonomous underwater vehicle systems to the Swedish Defence Materiel Administration under a multi year fleet modernization agreement. See our latest analysis for Teledyne Technologies. Those underwater vehicle deliveries land alongside several recent updates, including a completed US$400 million buyback program, new earnings guidance for 2026, and fresh space imaging hardware now...
